channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Potholes in Junction, 19th December
item.description:
Potholes in the junction of Reddings Road/Reddings Park. Needs addressing as my front wheel springs now need replacing - already had to replace the back ones this year!!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 74 Reddings Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Temp traffic lights causing jams, 19th December
item.description:
The temporary traffic lights and seasonal traffic are causing huge backlogs of traffic, The sequencing on the lights seems in appropriate as does the timing of these works right next to the retail park during the busiest time of the year.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): C D Bramel Van Centre Manor Road, Swindon Village
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement entirely blocked on the corner by maintenance barriers, 19th December
item.description:
These barriers have been here for months. Why hasn't the hole they're surrounding been filled in yet?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3 Hale's Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Damage to pavement and wall foundations by Virgin Media(?), 19th December
item.description:
Pavement dug up causing and damage to nearby slabs and private wall foundations. Yesterday, it was 'repaired' resulting in further damage.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 24 Lynworth Place, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
The road surface has been damaged and there are now large loose bits on the road.

item.title: Sunken drain, 18th December
item.description:
Sunken drain at the traffic lights junction of evesham rd and Clarence Rd. Been there for months.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Stita House, 11 Trinity Lane, Cheltenham

item.title: Massive wheelbreakers, 18th December
item.description:
There are some seriously large holes forming on the nearside of the westbound carriageway. These are previous repairs that have gone bad again and they need looking at ASAP before something serious happens.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 2 Oxford Cottages A436, Ullenwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flashing bollard, 17th December
item.description:
Keep left bollard is flashing constantly and has been for months
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): A40, Longlevens
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Elmbridge Court Roundabout, 17th December
item.description:
There are a number of street lights not working here. Would be grateful if someone could take a look and get them working again please?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Elm Bridge Court, Longlevens
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ice rink footpath, 16th December
item.description:
The footpath near the underpass and the pub is dangerously icy. I am a fit able-bodied person and I am now nursing a bruised hand after slipping over for the second time having only walked through that area twice since the snow fell. Not gritting the paths may be saving money for the council but it will be putting extra pressure on the NHS.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 34 Limber Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fairly deep pothole, 15th December
item.description:
Large deep pothole on the left of the road as you face the school from Cornwall Avenue.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 32 Cornwall Avenue, Cheltenham

Opposite The Clock Tower

item.title: Parking restriction signs have been defaced, 15th December
item.description:
Several of the signs in Marle Hill Parade showing the parking restrictions have been defaced with black paint, obscuring the information. As well as Marle Hill Parade, the sign outside 25 Marle Hill Road has been defaced and the one outside 3 Dunalley Parade.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 27 27 Marle Hill Parade, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Thick ice on road. Very dangerous, 14th December
item.description:
The true Ning from Shakespeare Road to Kipling road ans vice versa is treacherous. The ice is so thick and there is going to be a serious accident soon. I need my car to take my disabled daughter to school but itâ€™s terrifying driving on the roads around st marks. Can they be gritted ASAP please
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 43 Kipling Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Icy cycle lane, 14th December
item.description:
Could not use the new cycle lanes along A40 as they have not been gritted or cleared of snow. Please grit them when you grit the roads.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 10 Kingsley Gardens, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road like an ice rink,, 14th December
item.description:
Road urgently needs gritting. Accidents requiring police attendance and diversion of buses/cancellation of school bus 4 days after causatory snow is not acceptable
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Norwood North Road East, The Reddings
Report on FixMyStreet
